creator: sergeyli@pisem.net
text:
Line 70 in bin/catalina.bat:
echo Usage:  catalina ( env | run | start | stop )...should be replaced with...
echo Usage:  catalina ( env ^| run ^| start ^| stop )
...otherwise command interpreter tries to redirect output.
I'm sorry I can't test that on Windows 9x. It probably won't help there.
